EmailTemplate.name: Atlanta Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Sales Process Workshop - Atlanta, GA - February 12
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Sales Process Workshop - Atlanta Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you on Thursday, February 12, 2015 at:
Location: Atlanta Marriott Century Center/Emory Area 2000 Century Boulevard NE Atlanta, GA 30345 (404) 325-0000
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Atlanta Marriott Century Center/Emory Area, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/atlne-atlanta-marriott-century-center-emory-area/> or call the hotel directly at (404) 325-0000. vAuto, Inc., 1901 S. Meyers Road, Suite 700, Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181
Contact Us <#>
